text: Boley is a town in Okfuskee County, Oklahoma, United States. The population was 1,091 at the 2020 census. Boley was made a town in 1903 as a Black pioneer town with a few Native Americans among its citizens.(Decatur-Thomas, 1989) ==References== Category:Towns in Oklahoma Category:1903 establishments in the United States
title: Boley, Oklahoma
